attributes.action: Introduce Climate Change Studies into primary and secondary school curriculums.
attributes.additional_details:
We believe that studies on climate change should be added to the school curriculum.
This is because it is an important issue which needs to be managed, tackled and defeated.
attributes.background:
Practical education, such as; composting, producing eco-bricks, planting trees and litter picking.
Theoretical education, such as; how to reduce the amount of plastic you buy in a week and ways to lessen the amount of meat consumed in regular meals.
